thread.section_title: Mazuma Mobile Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mazuma Mobile Australia | mazumamobile.com.au
thread.title: Sally-Ann
thread.title_full: Mazuma Mobile Australia reviewed by Sally-Ann

author: Sally-Ann
title: Sally-Ann
text:
Apart from the extremely slow postage, my transaction with Mazuma Mobile was excellent!
Customer service were very prompt with replies and lovely to deal with.
Once they finally received my 3 gadgets, the money was in my account within 24hrs!
Will definitely recommend them and use them again
Thanks for everything :)
